title: Ranking the top 50 players in baseball right now: MLB Rank 2025 in-season update
content: We asked ESPN MLB experts to give an updated top-50 ranking, allowing us to take stock of the best performances of the 2025 season so far.

title: MLB Rank update: What we got right -- and very wrong -- on both of this season's lists
content: Who is still too low in our update? Who did we miss in our initial list? Our best -- and worst -- rankings revisited.

title: Packers QB Love to have left thumb procedure
content: Jordan Love will undergo a procedure to repair a ligament injury to his left thumb, but the Packers expect the star QB to be ready for their season opener.

title: Source: OU's Mateer denies gambling involvement
content: Oklahoma's John Mateer, after screenshots of "sports gambling" on his Venmo account surfaced, has denied to OU officials ever being involved with gambling, sources told ESPN.

title: Cook back at Bills practice amid contract dispute
content: James Cook returned to practice amid his contract dispute with the Bills, appearing to at least pause his hold-in.

title: Alabama picks 'loyal' Simpson as QB1 for opener
content: Ty Simpson, who has served as Alabama's backup quarterback each of the past two seasons, will be the team's starter to open the 2025 season.

title: White: UFC fight at White House 'going to happen'
content: UFC CEO Dana White said a fight night at the White House on the Fourth of July next year is "absolutely going to happen."

title: Madrid want Bar√ßa-Villarreal U.S. game blocked
content: Real Madrid have slammed plans to play December's LaLiga game between Villarreal and Barcelona in the United States.

title: Opening night: Warriors-Lakers, Rockets-Thunder
content: The opening night of the 2025-26 NBA season will feature the defending champion Thunder hosting the Rockets and the Warriors visiting the Lakers.

title: Seles: 'Reset' after myasthenia gravis diagnosis
content: Monica Seles says she was diagnosed in 2022 with myasthenia gravis -- a neuromuscular autoimmune disease that causes weakness in voluntary muscles.

title: üëÄ Taylor Swift teases new album on Kelce pod
content: After a teaser post with a Taylor Swift-shaped silhouette fueled rumors, it was confirmed that the pop star will make her first appearance on the Kelce brothers' podcast.

content: What are the Cowboys doing?!? The Micah Parsons negotiations are just the latest in a line of costly mistakes.

content: These 10 NBA franchises have the best chance to capture the NBA title. What hurdles will they have to overcome to raise the Larry O'Brien Trophy?

content: The futures of Jonathan Kuminga, Josh Giddey and others remain in flux as the 2025-26 season draws closer.

content: Indiana has a winning record in 19 games without its superstar. Here are the keys to the Fever's success.

content: With the 2025 season right around the corner, we break down the top players, from quarterback to kick returner.

title: Venmo requests and death threats: Heckling in the digital sports betting age
content: Being an athlete in the public eye can have its perks, but also many challenges. The most recent one? Bettors requesting money if they aren't getting the wins.

title: Ranking the 30 best men's soccer club managers in Europe
content: ESPN ranks the top 30 men's managers in the European club game. Who is going to be No. 1? Pep Guardiola, Arne Slot, Luis Enrique?

title: How Flick won his battle with Ter Stegen in Bar√ßa coach's riskiest move yet
content: Hansi Flick and Barcelona pushed things to the limit with injured captain Marc-Andr√© ter Stegen and won. Time will tell if the gambit was a true success.

title: Bullpen watch: Bednar, Finnegan should see many save chances down the stretch
content: Here are the relief pitchers and closers to keep an eye on in fantasy baseball, including closer situations in New York and Detroit.

title: MLB playoff contender tiers: The locks, teams with work to do and the long shots
content: As hot streaks and cold spells jumble the postseason picture, here's how sure we are that your team will be playing in October.

title: The bloody life of a UFC Octagon
content: Since the UFC's birth in 1993, fighters, coaches and executives have come and gone. The one character that has never changed? The Octagon.

title: Orlovsky ranks the best NFL QBs in seven different traits: Who makes each top-10 list?
content: Which NFL quarterbacks have the strongest arms, greatest accuracy and best rushing ability? Dan Orlovsky stacked the 10 best in seven skill areas.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Man City could rival Man United for Donnarumma
content: Chelsea, Man City and Man United are set to go head to head for PSG goalkeeper Gianluigi Donnarumma. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: Cristiano to KC? How MLS clubs outside LA, Miami bring big stars to small markets
content: How do MLS teams outside of big-market cities convince big-name players to join them without the lure of Lionel Messi or the star power of Hollywood?

title: Little League game has close call with dust devil
content: A dust devil touched down at home plate during a Little League game on Sunday, making its way to the outfield before dissipating.

title: Cristiano Ronaldo, Georgina Rodriguez share engagement news with dazzling ring
content: Ronaldo's bride-to-be revealed her engagement to the soccer star with a post showing her ring on Instagram.

title: From 'Tank' to Canelo, seven boxers who would benefit from moving up in weight
content: The only thing preventing bigger fights for some of the top boxers in the sport is moving up a weight class (or two).

title: Waiver wire: Leila Lacan, Dominique Malonga among top pickups
content: Leila Lacan is an intriguing backcourt pickup for fantasy managers that need a boost, while Dominique Malonga continues to shine on the Storm.

title: Matthew and Brady Tkachuk on Olympic gold, Canada rivalry and new NHL CBA
content: What's it like being on the cover of a video game with their dad? And what are their thoughts on the Winter Games?

title: No government school has closed down in Kerala in nine years: Minister
content: Union Minister Jayant Chaudhary told Lok Sabha that 205 schools had closed down from 2019-20 to 2023-24. Sivankutty says numbers referred to multi-grade learning centres

title: IISc study highlights how H5N1 influenza poses serious risk to humans
content: Based on their findings, the researchers suggest that enhanced and proactive surveillance measures need to be implemented

title: Election Commission of India willing to correct ‚Äòmistakes‚Äô in Bihar draft roll: Supreme Court
content: While the petitioners reminded the top court of its promise to ‚Äústep in‚Äù if there was ‚Äúmass exclusion‚Äù of voters, the ECI‚Äôs lawyer said cited the draft roll and said it can be corrected by BLOs

title: Food Safety wing seizes 16,565 litres of spurious coconut oil in raids
content: 9,337  litres of coconut oil not meeting the standards seized from Kollam and 6,530 litres from Alappuzha

title: ECI summons West Bengal Chief Secretary to Delhi over State‚Äôs refusal to act against erring officials
content: The summon came after West Bengal Govt refused to suspended or registered FIR against against five persons including four officials as directed by the ECI

title: Bilawal says India's decision to suspend IWT an attack on Indus Valley Civilisation
content: Bilawal Bhutto-Zardari said that the Indus River is not only the country‚Äôs sole major water resource but is also deeply linked to the entire history of its people

title: As free bus travel for women rolls out on Aug. 15, A.P. govt. mulls aid for auto drivers
content: Livelihood security for key transport sector workers must be a priority alongside new welfare initiatives, says CM

title: Centre approves ‚Çπ468-crore semiconductor unit in Andhra Pradesh
content: With a production capacity of 96 million units per annum, the facility will be set up in collaboration with APACT Co. Ltd. of South Korea; Naidu thanks Modi

title: Sporadic incidents of violence mar Pulivendula, Vontimitta ZPTC byelections
content: Despite an impressive 77% voter turnout in Pulivendula, minor clashes between TDP and YSRCP activists and allegations of threats to officials overshadow the bypolls

title: House panel questions ‚Äòperpetual‚Äô highway tolls, seeks removal after cost recovery
content: The Public Accounts Committee, in its report before Parliament, says users should be refunded toll tax where roads are unfit for use or under maintenance

title: Bihar SIR: EC data unclear if electors filing fresh applications are missing in draft rolls or are first time voters
content: Nearly 64,000 applications have been filed for fresh registration of voters, according to the Election Commission data released on Tuesday (August 12, 2025)

title: Amaravati must be a growth hub and most livable city, says Naidu
content: Chief Minister directs officials to complete capital city construction six months ahead of schedule; says it should generate large-scale economic activity, attract investors, create jobs, and serve as a hub for sports, tourism, education, and healthcare

title: Family petitions CM for NIA probe into death of woman in Kothamangalam
content: The police have ruled out the allegations of attempted forcible religious conversion and stated that it appeared to be a case of a failed love affair

title: Andhra Pradesh shrimp farmers gear up for Statewide stir over steep U.S. tariffs
content: Farmer and aquaculture leaders warn that the 50% hike in U.S. import duties has plunged the sector into crisis, and demand procurement, subsidies, and domestic market expansion to protect livelihoods

title: ‚ÄòFaulty‚Äô voter list for Thrissur LS poll sparks political firestorm
content: Residents in many apartments stunned to discover that names had quietly made it to the voters‚Äô  list without the actual occupants knowing a thing about it. Congress, LDF demand Thrissur MP Suresh Gopi‚Äôs resignation.¬†BJP leaders dismiss allegations as politically motivated

title: KAU-ABI opens Common Incubation Centre, launches farm exports to GCC
content: This is the first time in India that products manufactured using an agri business incubator‚Äôs facilities within a university have entered the export market, according to KAU sources.

title: Telangana feels left out after Union Cabinet nod for semicon projects in A.P., Punjab, Odisha
content: Allegations of BJP-led Centre discriminating against Telangana gain momentum as the Revanth Reddy government had pitched for such projects

title: Karnataka High Court refuses to interfere with State‚Äôs decision to have its own education policy instead of NEP-2020
content: Observing that courts do not interfere in policy decisions of governments unless they are violative of constitutional or statutory rights, the High Court of Karnataka on Tuesday declined to interfere in the State government‚Äôs decision to come out with its own education policy by ignoring the National Educational Policy (NEP)-2020

title: Braving rain, ASHAs launch indefinite protest in Kalaburagi over unkept pay hike promise
content: The health activists are demanding ‚Çπ10,000 monthly honorarium and their union vows to stay put until the State acts in their favour

title: BJP MLC‚Äôs Bombay Days piques curiosity in Council
content: I have written and documented everything in detail in my book Bombay Days, but leaders from all three parties have pleaded with me not to release it, says AH Vishwanath

title: ASHAs launch three-day agitation in several districts
content: Accredited Social Health Activists are seeking the fulfilment of their demands, including giving ‚Çπ10,000 honorarium from April 2025

title: Petroleum Ministry says E20 fuel helps better ride quality, refutes impact on insurance
content: Ministry underlined that blended fuel provides better acceleration and better ride quality; weighted average price of ethanol higher than the cost of refined petrol

title: Govt. instructs all department heads,  Collectors to take Sadbhavana Diwas pledge
content: The ceremony aims to uphold social harmony and mutual respect within the country‚Äôs multi-ethnic society

title: After transplantation, quality of life improves but mental health concerns remain, says study¬†
content: Study investigates multifaceted post-transplant experiences of organ recipients in Kerala, emphasising the interplay of physical, psychological, social, and economic dimensions that shape their lives after transplant.

title: Channel CSR funds for rural education and skill development, Lanka Dinakar urges Union Education Minister
content: He highlights untapped potential of CSR resources to complement flagship government schemes and enhance access to quality education and vocational training in underprivileged areas

title: Vice-Chancellors direct colleges to mark ‚ÄòPartition Horror Day‚Äô; Kerala University pulls back amid mounting opposition
content: Colleges directed to organise programmes, including seminars, plays and poster-making to mark the occasion. Both the Students Federation of India and the Kerala Students Union have vowed to block any event organised in connection with the observance

title: Model status for Thrissur employment exchange
content: Second in the State to receive designation. Minister Sivankutty launches the State‚Äôs first phase of smart card distribution for all registered jobseekers

title: Aanathazhchira to be transformed into a nightlife tourism destination
content: Project will be implemented on 16.7 acres of land owned by Revenue department and Andoorkonam grama panchayat

title: Congress, Shiv Sena demand action against Israeli Ambassador¬†
content: After Ms. Vadra accused Israel of ‚Äúcommitting genocide‚Äù in Gaza, the Ambassador accused her of ‚Äúdeceit‚Äù; Congress, Shiv Sena (UBT) MP say the tone and tenor of his statement is ‚Äúunacceptable‚Äù

title: Singapore PM Lawrence Wong set to visit India in September
content: New initiatives are being firmed up ahead of Singapore Prime Minister Lawrence Wong‚Äôs likely visit to India next month

title: Deviant children emerging as a social concern in Kerala schools
content: Functionaries of the Higher Secondary School Teachers‚Äô Association (HSSTA), an organisation of teachers in government higher secondary schools, claim that such incidents have recently been reported from Kozhikode, Malappuram, Kannur, and Kasaragod, and other districts in the State as well.

title: Revenue department completes boundary marking of   Neelakurinji sanctuary
content: 32-sq-km Neelakurinji sanctuary declared at Kottakkamboor-Vattavada area in Devikulam taluk in 2006. Devikulam Subcollector says the settlement verification process will begin soon

title: Online gaming will be regulated based on panel report: Home Minister
content: IPS officer Pranab Mohanty-led committee, set up in April, is expected to submit its report in September, says the Minister; a total of 347 cases have been registered for online betting in the State since 2023, he says

title: 'Give me old-age pension': '124-yr-old' Minta Devi makes light of poll row
content: Minta Devi from Bihar has criticized opposition MPs for using her name in a protest against the Election Commission's voter roll revision. INDIA bloc leaders wore T-shirts with her name and a claimed age of 124, which she disputes. Devi questions their motives and denies any contact from the administration regarding the alleged discrepancy.

title: Centre reacts to 'fear mongering' on E20 petrol vehicles; Here's what it said
content: The Ministry of Petroleum and Natural Gas refutes concerns regarding E20 fuel's performance and safety, dismissing claims of significant fuel efficiency loss and insurance issues as unfounded. The ministry emphasizes E20's benefits, including improved acceleration, reduced emissions, and enhanced engine performance. It also highlights the program's economic and environmental advantages.

title: Out of league! Gill is breaking records ‚Äî even when he doesn't hold the bat
content: Shubman Gill has etched his name in cricket history by securing his fourth ICC Player of the Month award, a feat unmatched by any other male cricketer. His stellar batting performance in the July 2025 Test series against England, where he also captained the team, earned him this latest recognition.

title: Sam Altman promises more upgrades for ChatGPT users after GPT-5 backlash
content: Following criticism over GPT-5's rollout, Sam Altman pledges upgrades for ChatGPT users, addressing concerns about capability downgrades and restrictive conversational styles. OpenAI plans to boost capacity, add model choice flexibility, and refine GPT-5's style to be more engaging. Improvements are also coming for free-tier users, with more generous daily limits and occasional access to GPT-5.

title: Indus treaty: After nuke threat, Pak's desperate plea to India
content: The request came after Pakistan‚Äôs army chief, Asim Munir, issued a nuclear war warning and former foreign minister Bilawal Bhutto made statements calling for action over India‚Äôs position on the water-sharing agreement.

title: MS Dhoni didn't expect THIS kind of welcome from fans - WATCH
content: MS Dhoni enjoys a huge fan following. Recently, fans welcomed him with mobile flashlights. Dhoni led Chennai Super Kings (CSK) to five IPL titles and two Champions League T20 titles. He is the only captain to win all three major ICC trophies. Dhoni guided India to victory in the 2007 ICC T20 World Cup.

title: Elon Musk to OpenAI CEO Sam Atlman: You LIAR, you got ...
content: Elon Musk and Sam Altman's ongoing feud reignited on X after Musk accused Apple of favoring OpenAI in the App Store, prompting Altman to retort with allegations of Musk manipulating X for personal gain.

title: 'Trust deficit': SC on Bihar SIR showdown; what happened during the hearing
content: The Supreme Court is reviewing concerns about potential voter disenfranchisement in Bihar's electoral roll revision. The court highlighted a "trust deficit" between the Election Commission and the opposition, addressing arguments about excluded voters and document requirements. The court warned it might intervene if mass exclusion is proven, with the final roll due September 30.

title: 'Grossly incompetent': Trump bashes Jerome 'too late' Powell
content: Donald Trump has launched a scathing attack on Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell, criticizing his handling of interest rates and the escalating costs of the Fed headquarters renovation. Trump accused Powell of incompetence and demanded immediate rate cuts to stimulate the economy.

title: Rohit Sharma is not retiring! He's plotting an ODI comeback with ex-India coach
content: Rohit Sharma, after a hiatus from Test cricket and T20Is, is preparing to return to ODIs, aiming to play until the 2027 World Cup. He's training with Abhishek Nayar, a former teammate and experienced coach known for his work with players like Dinesh Karthik.

title: 'Not enough to be a software factory...': Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella to staff
content: Microsoft is undergoing a significant shift, transitioning from a software manufacturer to an "intelligence engine," according to CEO Satya Nadella. This transformation aims to democratize AI, empowering global users to create their own intelligent tools. Microsoft will focus on building AI systems that enable individuals and organizations to develop customized solutions, redesigning its technology stack to support this new vision.

title: Meme revived: Van in UK town displays altered image of JD Vance ‚Äì watch video
content: A van displaying a meme of a bald JD Vance drove through Charlbury, organized by ‚ÄòEveryone Hates Elon,‚Äô near Vance's reported vacation spot. The meme gained traction after Vance's remarks during a White House meeting with Zelensky.

title: 'Missed out badly': ABD fires shots at IPL teams for Brevis snub during auction
content: AB de Villiers criticized IPL franchises for missing Dewald Brevis in the auction after his explosive 125* against Australia. Brevis's record-breaking innings, surpassing Faf du Plessis's previous best, powered South Africa to a 53-run victory, leveling the T20I series. Australia's sloppy fielding and Brevis's dominance against spinners proved decisive, despite Tim David's brief resistance.

title: Mahomes gets family, brother Jackson‚Äôs support after preseason benching
content: Patrick Mahomes, despite limited playtime in the preseason game against the Cardinals, demonstrated his readiness and leadership. After a brief appearance that included a touchdown pass, Mahomes shifted to a supportive role, advising teammates and offering insights to the coaching staff. Coach Reid praised Mahomes' leadership, emphasizing his importance to the team's Super Bowl aspirations.

title: Tyreek Hill, ex Keeta Vaccaro rush baby Capri to ER; now recovering
content: Tyreek Hill's eight-month-old daughter, Capri, was rushed to the emergency room after developing alarming symptoms, causing significant concern for her mother, Keeta Vaccaro. Doctors swiftly stabilized Capri, and her condition improved by sunrise. Despite ongoing family turmoil, the outpouring of support from fans highlights the shared relief and gratitude for Capri's recovery.

title: Ciara becomes first to receive Benin citizenship under new descendants law
content: Ciara, the Grammy-winning singer, has made history by becoming one of the first to receive Beninese citizenship through a program aimed at reconnecting descendants of enslaved Africans. This initiative seeks to heal historical wounds and strengthen ties with the Black diaspora. Benin's efforts carry significant weight due to its role in the transatlantic slave trade.

title: Rahul Gandhi repeats 'vote chori' claim, this time for 48 LS seats
content: Rahul Gandhi has alleged vote theft in 48 Lok Sabha constituencies, including Bengaluru Central, claiming irregularities similar to those previously flagged. Congress sources indicate that the party plans to release details about these seats in phases.

title: Happy Independence Day 2025: Top 50 wishes, messages and quotes
content: India is gearing up to celebrate its 79th Independence Day on August 15, 2025, commemorating freedom from British rule. The nation will observe this significant day with flag hoisting ceremonies, distribution of sweets, and patriotic displays. The celebrations will serve as a reminder of the sacrifices made by freedom fighters and the importance of unity, self-sufficiency, and national pride.

title: Can education really be returned to the states? Linda McMahon‚Äôs tour explains how it happens
content: Education Secretary Linda McMahon has launched a nationwide tour to promote returning control of education to states, beginning in Louisiana, which has shown notable literacy improvements. The tour highlights local decision-making and resource sharing, amid efforts by President Trump to dismantle the US Department of Education. McMahon addresses concerns over special education funding and emphasises state flexibility, while legal and congressional challenges continue over the department‚Äôs future.

title: Taylor Swift on going public with Travis Kelce: 'Proud of each other'
content: Taylor Swift openly embraced her relationship with Travis Kelce, contrasting sharply with her past privacy, particularly with Joe Alwyn. Swift explained to TIME that they proudly support each other, dismissing the need to hide their romance. Since 2023, they've been publicly affectionate, attending events and date nights, fueling engagement speculations.

title: OCI rules tightened: Citizenship holders may lose status if convicted for 2 years
content: The Indian government has announced that Overseas Citizen of India (OCI) cardholders could have their registration cancelled if they are convicted and sentenced to imprisonment for two years or more. The OCI card can also be revoked if they are charge-sheeted for an offense that carries a potential jail term of seven years or more, according to a recent notification.

title: Big 'Make in India' push! Cabinet approves four new semiconductor projects - details
content: The Union Cabinet has approved four new semiconductor projects under the India Semiconductor Mission, boosting the nation's ecosystem. These projects, with an investment of Rs 4,600 crore, include India's first commercial compound fabrication facility and an advanced glass-based substrate packaging unit.

title: After 11 years, MS Dhoni's Rs 100-crore defamation case to finally go to trial
content: Mahendra Singh Dhoni's decade-old defamation case is finally heading to trial, as the Madras High Court has ordered proceedings to begin. Dhoni filed a Rs 100 crore suit against Zee Media and others, accusing them of falsely linking him to the IPL betting scandal. He will be available for examination, seeking to clear his name from baseless allegations.

title: 'War 2' advance box office update: Prediction of the opening day number and more
content: Independence Day will witness a major box office clash between Rajinikanth's 'Coolie' and Hrithik Roshan's 'War 2'. 'War 2', part of YRF's Spy Universe, faces high expectations after 'Tiger 3's average performance. Ticket prices have surged, with some exceeding Rs 2,000. 'War 2' currently lags behind 'Coolie' in advance sales, having collected Rs 4.71 crore so far.

title: Parliament passes new Income Tax Bill: Rajya Sabha clears it by voice vote
content: The Parliament approved the New Income Tax Bill, 2025, replacing the Income Tax Act, 1961, with the Rajya Sabha's approval. The bill aims to simplify tax procedures, reduce compliance burdens, and modernise outdated provisions. Sitharaman highlighted the bill's simplified language and incorporated recommendations from the Parliamentary Select Committee, while criticising the opposition's absence during debates.

title: Jaya Bachchan pushes a fan, 'Jolly LLB 3' teaser out: Top 5 Entertainment news
content: The 'Jolly LLB 3' teaser is out, receiving positive feedback. Jaya Bachchan confronted a fan attempting a selfie. Celebrities, including Janhvi Kapoor and Varun Dhawan, reacted to the Supreme Court's order on stray dogs. 'War 2' advance bookings trail 'Coolie'. Aamir Khan was spotted with Gauri after Faisal Khan's recent statements. The entertainment world is buzzing with these updates.

title: India‚Äôs first hydrogen-powered train is ready! Vaishnaw shares sneak peek - watch
content: Indian Railways is poised to launch its first hydrogen-powered train, marking a significant stride towards eco-friendly transportation. The inaugural service will run between Jind and Sonipat in Haryana, positioning India among the leading nations adopting hydrogen technology.

title: DGCA issues show-cause notice to IndiGo over simulator training lapses for 1,700 pilots
content: The DGCA has issued a show cause notice to IndiGo regarding alleged lapses in simulator training for approximately 1,700 pilots. The regulator found that IndiGo conducted critical airfield training on simulators unqualified for high-risk airports like Calicut, Leh, and Kathmandu. IndiGo is reviewing the notice and has committed to upholding the highest safety and compliance standards.

title: 'No coercive action': Big SC relief for owners of old vehicles; issues notice
content: The Supreme Court has provided temporary relief to owners of older vehicles in Delhi-NCR. An interim order protects owners of diesel vehicles over 10 years old and petrol vehicles over 15 years old from coercive action.

title: Record-breaker! Brevis shatters multiple T20I milestones in one match
content: Dewald Brevis, the Chennai Super Kings batsman, exploded with an unbeaten 125 off 56 balls against Australia in the second T20I at Marrara Cricket Ground. His record-breaking innings, featuring 12 fours and eight sixes, propelled South Africa to their highest T20I total against Australia, 218 for seven. Brevis's century, reached in just 41 balls, is the second-fastest for South Africa.

title: Best greeting card images to share with your friends on Independence Day
content: Independence Day 2025 is fast approaching, offering a chance to celebrate India's freedom with vibrant greeting cards. The article explores various card styles, from pop-up designs to elegant tricolor themes, and suggests platforms like Canva and Adobe Express for creating personalized cards.

title: Devil lies in action: Why injury-prone Bumrah's workload management is crucial
content: Since his 2018 Test debut, Jasprit Bumrah‚Äôs career has been plagued by recurring back injuries, beginning with a stress fracture in 2019. The problem resurfaced in 2022, forcing multiple long layoffs, surgery in 2023, and missed major tournaments. Earlier this year, back spasms sidelined him again, underlining the persistent toll his unique bowling action takes on his body.

title: Aadhaar 'not conclusive proof': SC backs EC in Bihar SIR; Sibal alleges ID rejection
content: The Supreme Court is currently reviewing petitions challenging the Election Commission's decision to conduct a Special Intensive Revision of electoral rolls in Bihar. Allegations of discrepancies, such as inaccuracies in voter status, have been raised by petitioners.

title: Sports Bill will end stagnation; bring in transparency: PT Usha
content: P T Usha, President of the Indian Olympic Association, strongly supports the National Sports Governance Bill, emphasizing its potential to revolutionize Indian sports administration by introducing transparency and accountability. Usha highlighted the bill's key provisions, including the establishment of a National Sports Board and a National Sports Tribunal.

title: Taylor Swift & Travis Kelce: GQ interview reveals 'normal' life
content: In a recent GQ cover story, Travis Kelce opened up about his relationship with Taylor Swift, highlighting how she keeps him grounded amidst NFL fame. Kelce emphasized Swift's invaluable advice and support in navigating the pressures of his career. He admires her work ethic and enjoys being her 'plus one,' just as she supports him on the field.

title: 125* in 56 balls! 'Baby AB' Brevis steals the show during T20I - Watch
content: Dewald Brevis, also known as 'Baby AB', showcased an amazing performance in the second T20I. He scored an unbeaten 125 off 56 balls against Australia. This helped South Africa reach 218/7. Brevis's innings included a variety of shots. He is also a leg-spinner. He dreams of playing for Royal Challengers Bangalore with Virat Kohli in the IPL.

title: 'If we are going down ...': Pakistan threatens to target RIL‚Äôs Jamnagar refinery
content: Pakistan's army chief, General Asim Munir, sparked controversy during his US visit by making anti-India remarks, including a threat to target Reliance's Jamnagar refinery. India strongly condemned Munir's "nuclear sabre-rattling" and questioned the safety of Pakistan's nuclear arsenal. Despite Pakistan's threats, India's military strength surpasses Pakistan's, with a larger active military and a growing nuclear arsenal.

title: Retail inflation plunges! July 2025 CPI at 8-year low; food inflation slips to -1.76%
content: Retail inflation has plummeted to a notable 1.55% in July 2025, marking an eight-year low since June 2017. A significant drop in food prices, with the Consumer Food Price Index at -1.76%, contributed to this decline.

title: 'They call it a menace, we call it a heartbeat': Ritika on stray dogs directive
content: Ritika Sajdeh, wife of Rohit Sharma, has voiced her concerns over the Supreme Court's directive to relocate stray dogs in Delhi-NCR to shelters. She advocated for humane solutions like sterilisation and vaccination programs instead of caging the animals. The court's order mandates immediate capture and relocation, with strict measures against obstruction, aiming to create stray dog-free localities.

title: 'Vote chori' row: Thousands protest KN Rajanna‚Äôs removal from cabinet
content: KN Rajanna was removed from his cabinet post. This followed his criticism of Rahul Gandhi. Supporters protested across Karnataka. One person reportedly attempted self-immolation. Siddaramaiah removed Rajanna after Congress high command directive. DK Shivakumar raised concerns about Rajanna's statements. Rajanna questioned Rahul Gandhi's vote theft allegations. BJP MLA R Ashoka commented on the situation.

title: Bengaluru Man's 30-Year Friendship Ends In Murder After Wife's Affair
content: A 39-year-old man was murdered in Bengaluru, allegedly by his childhood friend, who was in an illicit relationship with his wife.

title: 2 Pregnant Women Rescued From Disaster-Hit Dharali, Relief Efforts Intensify
content: Two pregnant women were airlifted from the disaster-affected Dharali village in Uttarakhand's Uttarkashi and are now receiving medical attention at the district hospital.

title: In UP District's Zoom Meeting On Education, A Porn Disruption
content: An important online meeting to discuss education facilities and other issues in Uttar Pradesh's Maharajganj district saw a strange disruption when someone joined using the link and played a porn video.

title: AAP Leader Says Party Exposed BJP's Vote Theft, Congress Remained Silent
content: Amid the row erupted over Congress MP Rahul Gandhi's "vote theft" allegations, AAP leader Priyanka Kakkar alleged that a "massive vote theft scam" is currently underway in the country and accused the BJP of "stealing votes" during the Delhi polls.

title: Frontline Soldiers In Ukraine See Zero Hope After Trump-Putin Meet
content: Ukrainian serviceman Vyacheslav was hopeful when Donald Trump returned to the White House earlier this year, optimistic that the US president could help end Russia's three-year invasion on Ukraine's terms.

title: From Parliament To Fashion Week: Jaya Bachchan And Her Public Outbursts
content: Actor-politician Jaya Bachchan once said that it was her "nature" to lose her cool if she doesn't like or agree with something.

title: India, China Could Resume Direct Flights Next Month, After 5 Years: Report
content: As India and China try to revamp their political ties, they are set to resume direct flights as early as next month, a Bloomberg report said, citing people familiar with the negotiations.

title: As Gaza Starves, A Look At Historic Use Of Famine As Weapon of War
content: There is increasing evidence that "widespread starvation, malnutrition and disease" are driving a rise in hunger-related deaths" in Gaza, a group of United Nations and aid organizations have repeatedly warned.

title: Florida Man Earns Rs 87,000 Reward After Capturing 87 Pythons In A Month
content: A Florida man bagged 87 invasive Burmese pythons in a month and earned a $1,000 reward through the state incentive system. Aaron Mann won the monthly prize money as part of the South Florida Water Management District's Python Elimination Program.

title: UP Parliamentarian Fined Rs 1.35 Lakh Over Building Construction
content: Samajwadi Party Sambhal MP Zia-ur-Rehman Barq was fined Rs 1.35 lakh for allegedly carrying out construction without getting the building plan approved, authorities said.

title: Iran Says It Arrested 21,000 'Suspects' During 12-Day War With Israel
content: Iranian police arrested as many as 21,000 "suspects" during the country's 12day war with Israel in June, a law enforcement spokesperson said on Tuesday, according to state media.

title: National Guard Deployed As Trump Takes Control Of Washington Police
content: President Donald Trump took unprecedented steps toward federalizing Washington, D.C. on Monday, saying it's needed to fight crime even as city leaders pointed to data showing violence is down.

title: Amidst Declining Trade Ties With India, Bangladesh Seeks New Partners
content: Bangladesh and Malaysia signed five memoranda of understanding (MoUs) and exchanged three notes in different areas of cooperation-- including defence, trade, and education-- on the first day of Chief Adviser Professor Muhammad Yunus's three-day visit

title: UP Assembly To Work For 24 Hours Straight, Government To Present Vision 2047
content: Days ahead of Independence Day, the Uttar Pradesh Assembly will set a new record by working for 24 straight hours to discuss the government's vision for the state's development till 2047, a year which will mark 100 years since India attained freedom.

title: Delhi Advocate Allegedly Jumps From 4th Floor, Dies
content: A 33-year-old advocate allegedly jumped to death from the terrace of a four-storey building in southeast Delhi's Lajpat Nagar.

title: Ahead Of Janmashtami, Muslim Artisans Craft Krishna Idols In UP
content: What stands out ahead of Janmashtami is the remarkable participation of Muslim artisans, who are skillfully crafting brass idols of Laddu Gopal, symbolising unity and communal harmony.

title: How Trump's Road To Russia-Ukraine Deal Could Differ On Paper And Ground
content: US President Donald Trump had said that Russia and Ukraine would have to swap land with each other as a part of a potential peace agreement. Currently, Russia holds 20 per cent of Ukraine's territory, while Ukraine barely holds any Russian land.

title: Israel Defence Minister Clashes With Military Chief Over Appointments
content: Israel's defence minister on Tuesday reprimanded the country's military chief over appointments made without his approval, as tensions simmered between the military and the executive ahead of a planned...

title: "Who Is Priyanka Gandhi": Bihar Woman Flares Up Over T-Shirt Protest
content: Minta Devi, a home-maker from a rural family in Bihar's Siwan, had a rude awakening today, finding her name on headlines as Congress's Priyanka Gandhi Vadra and her team wore T-shirts emblazoned with her face.

title: 2025 PLL Playoffs: Bracket, schedule, teams and players to watch
content: the 2025 premier lacrosse league regular season is complete . the playoff bracket is set for the Maryland Whipsnakes, Philadelphia Waterdogs and California Redwoods . each team gets at least one week off now, with the two top seeds earning a bye .

title: Bobby Witt Jr. returns for Royals; Astros' closer ailing
content: fantasy baseball buzz file aims to provide fantasy managers with the intel they need as news breaks around MLB . a few venues in midwestern cities could experience a little rain, with only the contest between the Detroit Tigers at the Chicago White Sox in jeopardy of any delay . the Los Angeles Angels will send Victor Mederos to the hill tonight for their home tilt against the los angels .

title: Ranked: The top 50 players going into the new Premier League seasonÔªø
content: the 2025-26 premier league season kicks off on friday at anfield . defending champions Liverpool host Bournemouth in the 2026 world cup . three all-time great premier league players have left the club .

title: Man United's third jersey is remake of infamous 'Cantona kung fu kit'
content: man united have gone back to the glory days of the mid-1990s in search of inspiration for their new retro third kit . the choice of colours alone will instantly ignite nostalgic pangs in all supporters of a certain vintage . when united's Eric Cantona attacked a fan in 1995 the black, yellow and blue palette is immediately reminiscent of the away kit worn by United between 1993 and 1995 .

title: Projecting the top 10 freshmen for the 2025 season
content: the start of the college football season is approaching . many true freshmen are battling for roles -- or even starting spots -- on their teams . it didn't take long for Jeremiah Smith and Ryan Williams to establish themselves as difference-makers .

title: AP preseason poll reaction: One big number for every team
content: the first AP poll of the 2025 college football season has been released . Texas begins the season at No. 1 followed by Penn State, Ohio State, Clemson and Georgia . the defending champion and third-ranked Ohio State is a rematch of last season's college football playoff semifinal .

title: NFL Future Power Rankings: We stacked all 32 teams' long-term expectations
content: in our annual Future Power Rankings, we ranked which teams are primed to be among the league's best over the next three seasons (2025 through 2027) each of the four categories was weighted to create the overall score: quarterback (20%), roster (30%), front office (25%) and coaching (25%). the results are based on how well each team is positioned for the future.

title: Tom Brady to Brock Purdy: Drafting 30 years of fantasy football greatness
content: we've come a long way since those early days, with 13 million players joining in on the fun in 2024 alone . we know exactly what we need from our Monday night players when it's the two-minute drill and the game is on the line . how do you play a fantasy league in which every touchdown has already been scored and every injury is already accounted for?

title: What it's like to be coached by Bill Belichick
content: former second-round pick was a free agent for the first time in his career . he had endured countless ankle injuries, and his goal was to protect his body . the new coach was rumored to be tough, and he was supposedly unapproachable .

title: 'Dana White's Contender Series': Season 9 matchups and results
content: "Dana White's Contender Series" returns for season 9 on august 12 . DWCS was an introduction to former champions such as jamahal Hill . new welterweight champion Jack Della Maddalena cracked the UFC roster .

title: 2025 Fantasy Football Draft Guide: Rankings, mock drafts and analysis
content: this draft guide will serve as one-stop shop for all of our best fantasy football picks possible in every draft you're in . we have everything needed to help you draft a great team and start the season with a shot . it doesn't matter whether you have been doing this for years or are a first-timer .
